author: peter_firmstone
msg: An experiment with Apache Ivy to produce a modular River build.

author: adrianc
msg: Fixed label widget rendering. Label widgets are inline elements except if they have the h1-h6 style, then they become block elements.

author: adrianc
msg: Suppress rendering a field group banner when there are no field groups. This eliminates the annoying horizontal line that appears on single forms.

author: nick
msg: Tweak HSLF and HWPF to work well with NPOIFS, and add unit tests for this
